about_the_game:
A DLC to allow users to support the developer of Lunar's Chosen!

*This DLC does not add any new content!*

This is a donation DLC only.

After a lot of requests for a donation DLC from users who received the game when it was free for additional ways to support the game, here it is. Only purchase this DLC if you understand you will get nothing in return. It's only here for those that wish to support development of the game! For anyone that does purchase this, thank you! I can only create games with the support of people like you!
